div.h3: The Wiscasset School Department Central Office hours will be 8:00 am - 3:00 pm ~ Monday through Thursday ~ until further notice. Thank you for understanding.

a.span: End of the Year letter from Superintendent Wood

div.p: End of the year letter from Superintendent Wood

a.span: Every Little Thing is Gonna Be Alright!

div.p: STUDENTS ~ we miss you!! Check out this Link to see how much!
Please see Wiscasset School Department Continuity of Learning Plan on our site: MENU >Info for Families>WSD Continuity of Learning Page

Attention Wiscasset Families ~ If you are a family with a new PreKindergarten student or a new Kindergarten student, who has not attended PreK in Wiscasset, we need to hear from you to begin the planning process for the 2020-2021 school year. Please contact us at ssouza@wiscassetschools.org or 207-882-4104 so that we may begin an enrollment count for the upcoming school year. If you know of a family who meets this criteria, please ask them to reach out to us as soon as possible. Thank you so much.

REMINDER: For those families who pick up meals, the pickup time will be 9-11 at WES beginning Monday, April 20. For those who receive delivery, the times will be the same as they have been, with buses departing at approximately 10:00. Please call your child's school if you have any questions ~ WES 207-882-7767 or WMHS 207-882-7722. Thank you.
End of the year letter from Superintendent Wood: https://5il.co/eyb8
The Wiscasset School Department Superintendent's office hours have changed until further notice. We will be open Monday ~ Thursday 8:00 - 3:00. Thank you for your understanding.

Wiscasset School Department
